data.name: CURSE Demo
data.detailed_description:
Play the CURSE demo!

What Scares You The Most?

Is It The Dark?

Or What Lurks Within It?

Curse is a contextual horror game that throws the player into the world of paranormal investigations.
Explore the infamous Atherton Manor, site of several deaths and disappearances over the last 100 years.
Think you have what it takes to reveal the secrets hidden in the shadows of Atherton Manor?

Take Heed Because The House Protects Itself…

data.short_description: Play the CURSE demo! Curse is a contextual horror game that throws the player into the world of paranormal investigations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+ 64bit
  • Processor: 2GB
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 Capable Graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+ 64bit
  • Processor: 3GB
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Capable Graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10+ 64bit
  • Processor: 2GB
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 Capable Graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: 3GB
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Capable Graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
